text: if you want to die  just go kill yourself already my forearm is now all bruised and really badly swollen from snapping rubber bands  my whole arm and my legs hurt from literally beating my self up  i dont hold back my punches anymore  i was trying to brrak my arm  if my dad hadnt been in the kitchen i would have gotten a knife and chopped my arm off  so many people here and on the teensw sub have encouraged me to keep going  without that  help  id definitely be dead by now  i dont know what to do anymore  i guess im just oversensitive  i can t wipe out those horrible memories  my mind keeps replaying those moments my parents said  I HATE YOU   just go kill yourself already   my life would be so much better without you   you re useless   you re so ugly  who would ever love you  and so much more i cant stop hearing them in my head  it triggers me so badly  i cant do anything  they dont know what im going through and from the way they treat me  i dont think i can ever tell them  the verbal and physical abuse haunts me  my friends dont even care enough to text or check up on me  i feel so alone and broken  i thought i was getting better  i thought i could do this  i realise now that perhaps  i was just being delusional  i dont want to give up yet but hurts so much   i already know how this ends but i guess i can try to keep going  just until i finally break down completely

text: VentI had posted here a couple weeks back  or whenever it was  I never went through with my plan for some reason  I guess because  like I said  I m too much a whimp   I ve been hoarding pills and razors and hoping I ll just man up and do it  I guess  It feels dumb talking about it but I just feel the need to say all of this I never really knew what people meant when they said everything was gray  or bland  I was diagnosed with depression and anxiety in early middle school  so it s nothing new to be suicidal paranoid  but for the past couple months the lack of anything is just so weird  I don t crave food  I don t feel hungry  I don t like to eat  and when I do finally get around to eating  food is just tasteless  Even sweets that I used to love aren t appealing to me anymore  Every breath seems like physical work  It s like I m trying to inhale with somebody sitting on my chest  I m easily irritable and angry at everything  which has lost me the very few people I knew in this town  my migraines have gotten noticeably stronger and more persistent  Everything is going so slow  taking so long  just passing by in some sort of surreal way  Anxiety constantly tears apart all relationships I dare have  whether they be friendly or romantic   I constantly just feel far away from conversations  contemplating the Suicide I ll possibly never commit  or maybe not in the near future at all  At work  at home  with people  it s all I can think about  What if  What if I just sped this car up and went straight into that wall  What if I just took all my meds at once  What if I just slit my wrist  or hung myself  or any of the other options  What if I failed
summary: Vent has been depressed and anxious for the past couple of months. He has been hoarding pills and razors in the hope that he will kill himself. He was diagnosed with depression and anxiety in early middle school. His migraines are getting stronger and more persistent.

text: Text start to  I ve seen some posts about people calling national hotlines and being hung up on and that breaks my heart  That s fucking ridiculous   I recently started volunteering for the crisis text line and I recommend it to anyone here  I ve struggled myself for many years and came to know the Crisis Text Line because my therapist recommended I text in to it when I was struggling last year   We re real people who really want to help you  It also takes some of the anxiety away from actually talking on the phone if that s not your thing   Disclaimers Our messages can only be   characters back to you so if they seem short that s why  But  you can send as many long messages as you need to We do follow a certain timeframe we want to talk to you and divert you from your crisis so we re going to talk to you about coping skills and try to help you find ways to manage the way you re feeling when you re not talking to us  We re not doing this to be dismissive or anything  We want to find out what can help you when we can t be around to help  you know   I truly wish you all the best and want you to get the help that you re looking for  I m not sure if it s legal or whatever for me to post this but I recommend you try it  If it s not working or something  you can always text  stop  at any time and we re legally not allowed to text back  Good luck everyone
summary: Crisis Text Line is a national hotline for people who are in crisis. It's run by real people who want to talk to you about coping skills and help you find ways to manage the way you're feeling when you're not talking to them. They're not allowed to text back.
cleaned: crisis text line national hotline people crisis run real people want talk cope skill help find way manage way feel not talk not allow text

text: Relationship Entry   This is a diary like series where I talk about the times I spend with my wonderful girlfriend I got to go back over her house last weekend  It was so great to see her again  I was starting to get really sad and depressed without being able to see her more often  When I saw her again my smile came right back on my face  I reminded her a lot of how much I loved her while I was there  she seemed to like that  We played some games  watched the Addams Family because I hadn t seen it until then And that s pretty much it  so I guess there isn t really any super duper related information to give here  so I ll try and give advice Trust is like a line  you just can t jump to the top of it
